Posts.Content: Hello BC friends,  I have 1.9 REMOVED tumor HER2+ and getting Taxol & Herceptin weekly for 12.  No radiation as of yet.  Found a mass on other breast after 7 treatments.  Anyone have that.  I also implants with reconstruction so I thought possibly I could be feeling something else although it sure feels like the last little monster they removed.  Thank you so much for reading and helping.  It changes lives this website and I thank you for helping.
Posts.Title: New Tumor on Taxol

Posts.Content: I should add that my 2 CA27-29 tests were 42 pre-chemo and 33 after 6 rounds out of 12.  I also had the RCGG oncocount done and it was showing low circulating tumor and cancer cells.
Posts.Title: New Tumor on Taxol
